full_summary:
# Electronic Forklift Tender - Parks Canada
## Publication Details
 The tender for an electronic forklift to Parks Canada has been expired (refer to [tender status](#tender_status) for more information).
### Tender Reference Information
 | **Tender Reference** | **Number** |
 | --- | --- |
 | Reference Number (in English) | cb-193-53081250 |
 | Numéro de référence (in French) | cb-193-53081250 |
| Solicitation Number| 5P420-23-0346/A |
| Modification Number| 2 |
| Publication Date | 2024-02-15 |
### Tender Closing Date and Time
The tender closing date and time for this solicitation is 2024-02-29, 16:00:00.
### Other Important Dates
The expected contract start date is 2024-03-01, and the expected contract end date is 2024-03-31.
### Procurement Details
#### UNSPSC Code and Description
 The tender is classified under the UNSPSC code 24101603, which corresponds to "Forklifts" in English and "Chariots élévateurs à fourche" in French.
#### Procurement Category
The procurement category for this tender is Goods and Services (GD).
#### Tender Type and Method
The tender type is unknown (no notice type was provided); however, the procurement method is competitive-selective tendering.
#### Selection Criteria
The selection criteria for this tender are Lowest Price (in both English and French).
### Trade Agreements
The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
#### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The regions of opportunity for this tender are Canada (in French and English), and the regions of delivery are British Columbia (in French and English).
### Contracting Entity Details
#### Organization Name (English and French)
The contracting entity for this tender is Parks Canada (Parcs Canada).
#### Address Information
The address of Parks Canada is:
Address Line 1 (English): 220 4 Avenue Southeast
Address Line 1 (French): 220 4 Avenue Southeast
City (English): Calgary
City (French): Calgary
Province (English): Alberta
Province (French): Alberta
Postal Code: T2G 4X3
Country (English): Canada
Country (French): Canada
#### Contact Information
